Updates the velocity of the source ball, given an impulse, then uses the context's interactWith method to determine the post collision behavior, from the context ball's perspective.

updateState(Ball, IDispatcher<TDispMsg>) - Method in class model.Strategy.AngryShakingStrategy
In this update method, the velocity in the x-axis is set to randomize from -5 to 5 and the velocity in the y-axis is set to 0 to mimic shaking.
